requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #4 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #4 API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Quiet hours compliance (don't text at 3am)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #11 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #11 API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Kill switch for rogue agent behavior". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.
